name: Premium
summary: Premium consists of four scenarios, each one of which is dedicated entirely to sex (sometimes with a bit of conversation and very straight-forward seduction before). There is no real story, just a series of encounters of nameless protagonists with different types of young women. Each of the four scenarios is dedicated to a specific occupation, which are: school girl, maid, magician, and finally Buddhist nun.
info:
• 开发: シルキーズ
  • 人物设定: 柳沢正秀、柳沢まさひで
  • 原画: 桂憲一郎、柳沢正秀、柳沢まさひで
  • 发行日期: 1992-09-17
